subject: DO WE PAY HIM   Rebecca
body:

Carson City, NV 89701

Yours Faithfully,

subject: Re: DO WE PAY HIM   Rebecca
body:
Hello Mrs. Lillian Bentley,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, I'm a bit surprised by your message. I don't recall authorizing anyone named Mr. Samuel Thomas to claim any funds on my behalf. Could you please provide more details about this situation? 

Also, who is Dr. Handson Richardson? You mentioned him several times in your message but didn't explain his role in all of this.

I'm sorry for the confusion, but could you clarify these points for me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: DO WE PAY HIM   Rebecca
body: With regards to your several questions, I am compelled to asked Miss Sarah Emmanuel to furnish me with more information concerning the transfer under your name. She has just said that the only information available are the amount #45.5m. your name and email address. Every other information required is not there. I'm thinking that, as it is, it's either some people want to use your name to divert money which is common practice in nigeria. You can be stopped right now by writing to me and copy Miss Sarah Emmanuel intimating her that you never authorize any one to take care of your transfer and that you would rather be advised on how you can process your transfer by yourself. That you want to know how you can put together the documents and what is involved to so,  so you can send your receiving bank details by yourself for receiving your money and how long it will take the paying bank to execute the transfer.

subject: Re: DO WE PAY HIM   Rebecca
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this situation involving my name and a transfer. I must admit, it's all a bit confusing to me.

I'm curious, how did Miss Sarah Emmanuel come across my name and email address? And why would someone want to use my name for such a purpose? 

Also, could you please explain more about the process of handling the transfer myself? What kind of documents are needed and what steps should I take?

I appreciate your help in understanding this matter better. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Rebecca

subject: Re: DO WE PAY HIM   Rebecca
body: The new administration in nigeria, due to undue lost in contract payment did set up a Presidential Fact Checking Teams (P-FACT), part of their terms of reference is to check what I had just told you in my last mail. It's a common practice over there to divert funds, so the authorities felt that so much has been lost unaccounted hence the Team was set up. If not for the check the money mentioned to you would have just left without your knowledge. All they needed is your name and email as the case may be and the rest is as good as done. But I must tell you that even the Team themselves need money too if the see that the cost is clear and you can play ball and you can speak their language. (You know what I mean). For the fact that your email address has enterd the pay and records they know what to do. They know how to source the documents to make the transfer legal. To the best of my knowledge, what Sarah will require from You are Your full name, your house or office address. Telephone number and your bank account details. To procurement the documents you will be required to send money for them but not at at once and I am sure receipt would be sent to you for perusal and records. You will also have to agree with her on persentage first.

subject: Re: DO WE PAY HIM   Rebecca
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to learn about the Fact Checking Teams in Nigeria and their role in preventing fund diversion. I can see how important their work is.

I'm curious, though, how does the team operate exactly? And what kind of language do they speak that one needs to understand to "play ball"?

As for Sarah, it sounds like she plays a crucial role in this process. Could you tell me more about her? What is her position and how does she help in making the transfer legal?

I appreciate your time and look forward to learning more about this process.

Best wishes,
Rebecca
